banner.text: SynergyRecycle.B: "Every action counts, together we make the difference."

hero.title: "Our Platform: to help us, help the World."
hero.subtitle: We build digital experiences, revolutionize the way things are done, let's stand out.

blockchain.title: With the Polygon Blockchain, the future will be sustainable
blockchain.paragraph: Our technology based on the Polygon blockchain connects every stage of recycling to maximize positive impact, ensuring transparency and traceability.

success.title: We Drive Success through: Efficiency, Reliability, Innovation, Scalability.
success.paragraph1: We fine-tune a unique customer experience.
success.paragraph2: Digital strategies and tailored research based on Reliability and Innovation.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.text: We optimize processes and resources for maximum results with minimum waste.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.text: We guarantee transparency and security thanks to blockchain technology.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We constantly develop cutting-edge solutions for sustainability.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.text: We design flexible systems ready to grow with our community.

building.title: Discover what we are Building.
building.paragraph1: We help people and companies thrive in an ever-evolving eco-conscious landscape.
building.paragraph2: We leverage our experience to provide intuitive and powerful tools, empowering everyone to contribute and grow.

cta.title1: All People do a lot for themselves, but still too little for our Planet.
cta.title2: Become part of SynergyRecycle.B: together we could revolutionize the future of our World.
cta.paragraph: Join us to improve, and together we will improve our Planet.
